title: Education
accomplishment: I was a Software Engineering student at MDU, proudly served as the Vice Captain of the college volleyball team.
Alongside my leadership in sports, I maintained academic excellence, achieving a CGPA of 7.7 out of 10.0 in my 8th semester.
I was an all-rounder in school and a key member of the volleyball team.
I played a pivotal role in securing three Zonal Gold Medals for my team, contributing to both the Junior and Senior teams successes.
